alert.note: Alert for Dunn (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:43AM CDT until April 12 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the Knife River at Manning affecting Dunn County in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Knife River at Manning. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...A flood of 14.89 ft created problems and required sandbagging of rural homes in 2009. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday /7:00 AM MDT Wednesday/ the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.4 feet on 03/22/2019. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
